name: Caregiver: General_July.2023
description: The Caregiver Collection represents the skills acquired and cultivated by individuals with prior experience as homemakers, family caregivers, or household managers. This collection showcases the transferable skills gained outside the workplace and their relevance in professional settings. This collection showcases their proficiency in critical thinking and problem solving, project management and collaboration, and initiative and responsibility. It was developed in collaboration with a panel of individuals who have previously served as domestic caregivers, or primary caregivers.
creator: https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-036d082d-d80e-41a7-99a0-2d63a4ad3a4a
author: Western Governors University
